programme.desc: An idealistic scientist goes to India to sell genetically modified rice, but things change when she falls in love a local farmer and the locale, in this musical romantic comedy.

programme.title: Sabrina The Teenage Witch
programme.desc: Before the sitcom that shaped a generation, there was this bewitching Sabrina movie. Melissa Joan Hart plays the not-so-normal new girl in town who discovers on her sixteenth birthday that she possesses magical powers. But with a family of witches and a sarcastic talking black cat, Sabrina's biggest challenge isn't just fitting-in, it's surviving high school.

programme.title: Valentine: The Dark Avenger
programme.desc: Srimaya, a waitress at a caf√©, dreams of a glamorous life as an actress. A chance meeting with a film director and his assistant leads to a life-changing series of events for Srimaya, as they take her on a thrilling adventure that finds the waitress-turned-actress transforming into the person Batavia City needs and deserves most: the consummate kick-ass superhero!

programme.title: Welcome Home, Roxy Carmichael
programme.desc: A small town prepares for the homecoming of superstar Roxy Carmichael, as does a young outsider, who believes Roxy is her mother.

programme.title: Hearts Beat Loud
programme.desc: A father and daughter form an unlikely songwriting duo in the summer before she leaves for college.

programme.title: Labyrinth
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.
